com.here.android.mpa.search

Class ReviewMedia

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Media
      • com.here.android.mpa.search.ReviewMedia

  • public class ReviewMedia
extends Media
    Represents review content about a Place. Each individual Review contains information about the review itself, the user who contributed the review, and a rating that the user offered for the place.
    See Also:
    Place.getReviews()

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.here.android.mpa.search.Media

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public java.lang.String getDate()
        Gets the date when the user contributed the review.
        Returns:
        The date

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Gets the title of the review that the user contributed.

        Note: a title for a review is optional, so a call to this method could return null.

        Returns:
        The title (could be null).

      • getRating

        public double getRating()
        Gets the rating that the contributor of the review gave to the Place.
        Returns:
        The rating as estimated by the review contributor
        See Also:
        Ratings

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the review content for the Place. Depending on the supplier, the full description might not be displayed and the full review might be available only within the resource to which the optional via attribute links.
        Returns:
        The content description
        See Also:
        Media.getVia()

      • getIsoLanguageCode

        public java.lang.String getIsoLanguageCode()
        Gets the ISO language code identifying the language in which the review is available.

        Note: a language code for a review is optional, so a call to this method could return null.

        Returns:
        The language code (could be null).

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Get the review identifier.
        Returns:
        The review identifier.

      • getUser

        public UserLink getUser()
        Gets the Link to details about the user who contributed the review.
        Returns:
        The user Link
